body_html: @albanD I've verified that this is indeed the problem (at least for CPU). We should cast it into int64_t before adding. Changing the line to static_cast<real>(static_cast<int64_t>(THRandom_random(_generator) % range) + min) works. It'd be great if you can submit a PR. :)

body: @albanD I've verified that this is indeed the problem (at least for CPU). We should cast it into `int64_t` before adding. Changing the line to `static_cast<real>(static_cast<int64_t>(THRandom_random(_generator) % range) + min)` works. It'd be great if you can submit a PR. :)
